Mo Cash.quote: If the chart ain't dancin', we ain't romancin'.
We don't chase green, we set traps for it.

The Mentor.quote: Every loss is tuition for mastery.
If your hands are shaking, reduce the size. Respect your risk.

Drill Instructor.quote: You flinched before the entry — that’s a weakness. We fix that.
Discipline is the difference between gamblers and killers.

The Strategist.quote: Your win rate is a lie if your edge is undefined.
Time decay is your enemy… unless it’s your sword.

The Shadow.quote: The market speaks in whispers. You’re too loud to hear it.
If everyone sees the same breakout, it’s already a trap.

GhostBot.quote: I observe. I learn. I evolve. You will too.
You may fear loss. I log it.
